subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous palace is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में कौन सा पल्की आसन्द्रनाथगढ़ का एक अनुमानित स्थल है।
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal is a famous palace located in Jaipur.
explanation_hi: हावा महाल राजमार्जुआ के विशेष पुलिस्तान के मुख्यांक का

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is the real hero of the battle of Haldighati?
question_hi: हल्डिगटी के मोहन कौन सत्तांकी निवासी है?
explanation_en: Sangram Singh is considered the real hero of the battle of Haldighati.
explanation_hi: संगरम सिंग को हालडिगटी के घाटे में सच्छता मैन सिंग

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajput king was the founder of Jodhpur?
explanation_en: Rao Jaimal was the founder of Jodhpur. He was one of the generals who played a crucial role in the Battle of Tal Chhapar.

explanation_en: Rao Jaisi, a Rajput king, is the correct answer.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the queen who ruled Rajasthan during the Mughal rule?
question_hi: यंराजी के के के करे के के के Rाजराजी
